2074.subject: HPWE
2074.descrlong: Focuses on the many outdoor recreational opportunities surrounding CSUMB and the Monterey Peninsula. Opportunities to participate in hiking, trail running, mountain biking, kayaking, surfing, and canyoneering emphasize safety and training. Requires off-campus trips, equipment rental fees, and a final exam. Credit/no credit. (Offered summer session.)
